entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
